reviewText: At The Coliseum (DVD with Jotter,Pen and Photo) (Amazon.com Exclusive) With Il Divo you can never go wrong. The package of items arrived promptly and in excellent condition. The DVD was clear and SO enjoyable. I very much liked the interviews and comments of the group and learned much more about them personally. The jotter notepad/pen are very nice with the Il Divo logo stamped on the cover and the autographed PHOTO was terrific! I'd certainly recommend the purchase to all!

I am a great fan of Il Divo since 2004 and I am very glad that they improved any year! All songs are great, their voices sound terrific, and their look is marvelous.  You get what you paid 100%.
I have a complain for Amazon, I DID NOT GET MY PHOTO!!!!
